title: An Act establishing the uniform interstate depositions and discovery act

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Howitt of Seekonk, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1765) of Steven S. Howitt for legislation to establish the uniform interstate depositions and discovery act.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/04/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 11/04/2025 from 01:00 PM-02:30 PM in A-1                                                                                                                       and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
